H0.text: Who wrote the opera Faust in 1859. Verdi

H1.text: Who wrote the opera Faust in 1859. Wagner

H2.text: Who wrote the opera Faust in 1859. Donizetti

H3.text: Who wrote the opera Faust in 1859. Gounod

A4.text: He wrote twelve operas, of which the most popular has always been Faust (1859);

A5.text: Faust (1859) has remained Gounod's most popular opera and one of the staples of the operatic repertoire.
